mapper.select: select * from websocket_message where websocket_message_type != 'dm' order by websocket_message_no asc

select * from websocket_message
where websocket_message_type = 'chat' or websocket_message_type = 'system' or ( websocket_message_type = 'dm' and ( websocket_message_sender = #{usersId} or websocket_message_receiver = #{usersId} ) ) order by websocket_message_no asc

select WM.websocket_message_no "no", WM.websocket_message_type "type", WM.websocket_message_sender "sender_users_id", U.users_type "sender_users_type", WM.websocket_message_receiver "receiver_users_id", WM.websocket_message_content "content", WM.websocket_message_time "time" from websocket_message WM left outer join users U on WM.websocket_message_sender = U.users_id
where
( WM.websocket_message_type = 'chat' or WM.websocket_message_type = 'system'
or ( WM.websocket_message_type = 'dm' and ( WM.websocket_message_sender = #{usersId} or WM.websocket_message_receiver = #{usersId} ) )
)
and websocket_message_no < #{firstMessageNo}
order by WM.websocket_message_no desc
order by "no" asc
